籤詩版本二:
Piʻi ka lapalapa i ka lani, a ulu ka lotus i ka lapalapa
I ka hopena, e kūleʻa ana a ʻaʻole e pōʻino, e ulu mau ana nā lau a me nā aʻa.
詩意:
Ua like kēia hexagram me ka lotus e ulu ana i ke ahi.
ʻO nā mea a pau he pōʻino akā ʻaʻole pilikia.
解曰: ʻOiai i ka pilikia. ʻAʻohe pōʻino i kona kino. I mea e ola ai. Hui lakou a pau me na kanaka hanohano.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ke awāwa ʻumeke ahi
I ka wā o nā Aupuni ʻEkolu, ua hoʻouka pū ʻo Liu Bei lāua ʻo Zhou Yu iā Cao Cao. Ua hoʻokumu ʻo Kong Ming i ʻehiku mau hōkū e hoʻomana i ka makani hikina a kōkua iā Zhou Yu e puhi i ka pali ʻula. auhee pu me ka puali pio.
Ua hoʻohālua nā pūkaua o Kongming i nā wahi a pau.
Ua hele ʻo Cao Cao i ka waha o ke awāwa ʻo Hulu e hoʻomaha a kuke. ʻIke ʻo ia i ka pōʻino o ka ʻāina a ʻaʻohe mea hoʻohālua, ʻakaʻaka ʻo ia.
Ua lohe koke ʻo ia i ke kani ʻana o ka pū a hele mai ʻo Zhang Fei e pepehi iā ia.
Ua ʻā ke ahi ma nā wahi a pau o ke awāwa, a ua hakakā ka pūʻali koa o Cao Cao, ua kau ʻo Cao Cao i kona lio a holo me ka hopohopo i ke ahi.
E lanakila a hele i ke alanui Huarong.
(ʻOiai ua pilikia ʻo ia, hiki iā ia ke hoʻopakele i kona ola.)
聖意: ʻAʻole maikaʻi ka home, e makaʻala i ka ʻimi waiwai, hana, kālepa, male ʻino, keʻakeʻa iā Liujia, hoʻoweliweli i ka poʻe hele wāwae, keʻakeʻa i nā mahina ʻai, nalo nā enuhe silika, ʻeono holoholona i pōʻino, ʻike ʻia nā kānaka, nalowale nā ​​hihia aupuni komohana, neʻe. mālama ʻia, nalowale nā ​​mea, hoʻonohonoho ʻia nā maʻi, hoʻouna ʻia i mauna a hoʻoponopono ʻia nā hale kupapaʻu.
